author: Sam McNeil / AP
title: Wuhan Farmers Face Hardship as Their Crops Rot Due to Travel Limitations
description: Chinese authorities are easing travel controls, but some crops deemed nonessential are rotting while farmers wait for permission to move them to market.
content: (HUANGPI, China) — Stuck in the same bind as many other Chinese farmers whose crops are rotting in their fields, Jiang Yuewu is preparing to throw out a 500-ton harvest of lotus root because anti-coronavirus controls are preventing traders from getting to his… [+3488 chars]
